title: Bob Metcalfe, The Man Who Discovered Network Effects, Isn't Sorry
description: Bob Metcalfe, inventor of ethernet, coined the law that explains the power and pathologies of social platforms. He also just won computing’s highest honor.

title: The Fight to Expose Corporations’ Real Impact on the Climate
description: Most carbon emissions caused by businesses are hidden from sight. US and California regulators are pushing to require companies fully disclose them.

title: The TikTok Hearing Revealed That Congress Is the Problem
description: The interrogation of CEO Shou Zi Chew highlighted US lawmakers’ own failure to pass privacy legislation.
